opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Estate of John S. Garrett, Jr., Deceased, Bankrupt, Etc

opinion:
325 U.S. 898

65 S.Ct. 1562

89 L.Ed. 2007

ESTATE OF John S. GARRETT, Jr., deceased, Bankrupt, etc.

No. 467.

Supreme Court of the United States

June 18, 1945

Messrs. Vincent P. McDevitt, of Philadelphia, Pa., for petitioner.

Messrs. Ernest Scott and Joseph S. Conwell, Jr., both of Philadelphia, Pa., W. Edward Greenwood, of West Chester, Pa., and David Rosen, of Philadelphia, Pa., for respondent.

1

The motion for leave to file petition for rehearing is granted. The petition for rehearing is denied.
